name: nusmods
title: NUSMods
description: Search and explore NUS courses with detailed module information, prerequisites, timetables, and exam schedules powered by NUSMods API
author: wxiaoyun

commands.name: search-nus-courses
commands.title: Search NUS Courses
commands.description: Quickly find NUS modules by code or title, view comprehensive course details including prerequisites, workload, timetables, and exam schedules.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
